jobs: FixViolationCreateNewPerson: Add 'create new person' option to AddRelationshipModal (PDP-REL-04 spec says 'select/search existing or create new' but modal only searches existing). Add a test spec entry exercising the create-new path and implement the corresponding Playwright test
RunTests: Verify tests pass after AddRelationshipModal create-new fix

FixViolationCH01Test: Fix PDP-CH-01 test title from 'Contact history displays section with controls' to 'Contact history displays chronological log' to match spec, and add assertions verifying entry rows show date/time, type, summary, team member, and edit icon
RunTests: Verify tests pass after PDP-CH-01 fix
FixViolationRelationshipsHeading: Fix RelationshipsSection heading from 'Relationships' to 'Relationships with Other Individuals' to match PDP-REL-01 spec, and update any affected tests
RunTests: Verify tests pass after RelationshipsSection heading fix

FixViolationCDPTestsIncomplete: Fix ClientDetailPage Playwright tests - fix incomplete field assertions in CDP-QA-02 (missing description/duedate/priority/deal), CDP-QA-04 (missing value/owner), CDP-ATT-01 (missing date/deal columns), fix CDP-ATT-02 (test download not just filename visibility), fix CDP-ATT-03 (test view button not delete button), fix CDP-TL-03 title mismatch, fix CDP-HDR-02 through CDP-HDR-05 to use atomic timeline assertions (count before/after instead of .not.toHaveCount(0))
FixViolationCDPTestsMissing: Add missing ClientDetailPage Playwright tests - CDP-QA-10 through CDP-QA-13 (cancel button tests), CDP-TL-04 through CDP-TL-08 (timeline entry format and atomicity tests)
RunTestsCDPTests: Verify tests pass after Playwright test fixes
